attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please scrap the SIA as a bad idea. all it is, is another tax on hard working individuals who are trying to keep crime to a minimum. we are being penalised for working as security officers everytime we need a license. the SIA was set up to stop rough security firms from illegal activity. it takes far to long for a license to come and information is lost in the back log, i.e passports. i agree training should be provided but £250 for first and %50 off any others for a peice of plastic and knowledge that firms should give is riddickulous. scrap or reform the SIA
